We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private StandardDeviation _std;
// In Initialize()
_std = STD(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_std.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "STD Warm Up Period", _std.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STD Period", _std.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STD Is Ready", _std.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STD Current", _std.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STD Name", _std.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "STD Samples", _std.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.std = self.STD(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.std.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STD Warm Up Period", self.std.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STD Period", self.std.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STD Is Ready", self.std.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STD Current", self.std.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STD Name", self.std.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STD Samples", self.std.Samples);
}
